text: Antonio López García (born 6 January 1936) is a Spanish painter and sculptor. He is famous for his realistic style, for some considered as hyperrealistic. One of his paintings was the subject of the film Dream of Light, by Victor Erice (1982).Antonio López García biography ==References== ==Related pages== * List of Spanish painters Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish painters Category:Spanish sculptors
title: Antonio López García
